name: Luxurious Persian Carpet
description: A beautiful Persian carpet that enhances the elegance of your home decor.

review.overview: This Persian carpet is a luxurious addition to any home. Its intricate designs and vibrant colors make it a centerpiece in any room.
review.details: Handcrafted with care, this carpet offers unmatched quality. The dense fibers ensure durability, while the soft texture provides comfort underfoot. It's perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to your living space.

name: Elegant Crystal Chandelier
description: An elegant crystal chandelier that adds a touch of luxury to any room.

review.overview: This chandelier's stunning crystals and elegant design make it a focal point in any space.
review.details: With its exquisite craftsmanship, this chandelier illuminates your room beautifully while serving as a piece of art.

name: Modern Hanging Lights
description: Modern hanging lights that provide stylish and functional lighting.

review.overview: These hanging lights add a modern touch to any room, combining style and functionality.
review.details: The sleek design and efficient lighting make these hanging lights a perfect addition to contemporary homes.

name: Elegant Sofa Set
description: A comfortable and elegant sofa set that enhances your living room.

review.overview: This sofa set combines comfort and style, making it a perfect addition to your living room.
review.details: With its plush cushions and stylish design, this sofa set offers both comfort and elegance.

name: Premium Toilet Paper
description: Soft and strong toilet paper for a comfortable and hygienic experience.

review.overview: This premium toilet paper offers the perfect balance of softness and strength.
review.details: With its high-quality material, this toilet paper provides a comfortable and hygienic experience.

name: Effective Toilet Cleaner
description: A powerful toilet cleaner that removes stains and disinfects.

review.details: Its powerful formula ensures thorough cleaning and disinfection, making it a must-have for bathroom hygiene.

description: A stylish set of toilet accessories that enhance your bathroom decor.

review.details: The set includes a toilet brush, holder, and other accessories made from high-quality materials.

description: A gentle handwash that cleanses and moisturizes your hands.

review.details: Its gentle formula is suitable for all skin types and ensures thorough cleaning without drying your hands.

description: A luxury shower head that provides a spa-like experience at home.

review.details: Its high-pressure jets and adjustable settings make every shower feel like a spa treatment.

description: An instant water heater that provides hot water on demand.
